title: Une visite guidée du Paris noir (A Tour of Black Paris)
itunes:title: Une visite guidée du Paris noir (A Tour of Black Paris)
description:
In this special episode, we’re taking you on a guided audio tour through Paris to explore a unique side of the city: its Black history and culture! Join tour guide Kévi Donat in discovering the Black thinkers, artists, and leaders who helped make Paris the city it is today.

A transcript of this episode is available at https://bit.ly/3o42VK1.
